summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 NISSAN ROGUE. WHILE ACCELERATING FROM A TRAFFIC LIGHT, THE ENGINE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT ABLE TO RESTART. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO MENTOR NISSAN (6960 CENTER STREET, MENTOR, OH 44060) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE FUEL PUMP FAILED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V149000 (FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE). THE VIN WAS INVALID. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 42,000.
